col.name: body_subsite
description: Subsite of body site of acquisition.

col.name: antibiotics_family
description: Family of antibiotics currently used; Semicolon-separated.

col.name: study_condition
description: The main disease or condition under study; control for controls.

col.name: disease
description: Semicolon-delimited vector of conditions; Use healthy only if subject is known to be healthy; CRC=colorectal cancer.

col.name: infant_age
description: Infant age (days); should be used for infants < 2 years old.

col.name: age_category
description: Age category: newborn < 1 year; 1 <= child < 12; 12 <= schoolage < 19; 19 <= adult <= 65; senior > 65.

col.name: visit_number
description: Visit number for studies with repeated visits.

col.name: country
description: Country of acquisition using ISO3 code from http://www.fao.org/countryprofiles/iso3list/en/.

col.name: non_westernized
description: Subject belongs to a non-westernized community.

col.name: sequencing_platform
description: This will be modified as new sequencing platforms are added to the database.

col.name: PMID
description: Identifier of the main publication in PubMed.

col.name: number_reads
description: Number of final reads - calculated from raw data.

col.name: number_bases
description: Total number of bases sequenced in the sample.

col.name: minimum_read_length
description: Minimum read length - calculated from raw data.

col.name: median_read_length
description: Median read length - calculated from raw data.

col.name: birth_control_pil
description: Use of the birth-control-pils at the sampling time (men: no).

col.name: alcohol
description: Subject is reported as a drinker.

col.name: mumps
description: Subject has been through mumps in life.

col.name: days_after_onset
description: Days from the onset of the disease.

col.name: shigatoxin_2_elisa
description: Enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay for Shiga-toxigenic E.coli.

col.name: stool_texture
description: Texture of the stool at sampling time.

col.name: protein_intake
description: Indication about the protein intake in the Mongolians diet.

col.name: momeducat
description: Years of education of the mother of the subject.

col.name: hitchip_probe_class
description: High/Low species content onthe HIT-chip probe.

col.name: start_solidfood
description: First day of solid food introduction (newborns).

col.name: albumine
description: Albumine level; curators must use g/l.

col.name: family
description: A number identifying the family subjects belong; not corrected for meta-analyses.

col.name: uncurated_metadata
description: A row for whatever field has not be included here.
